item.title: Bio Dome Homes
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: Story can render music notation in your website.As a family, we, Alosha & Zoya from Bio-Veda Academy, have abandoned our home in the final stages of mortgage repayment. It was not an easy decision, but one that completely flipped our lives, unlocking incredible opportunities we could have never dreamt possible.

item.title: Connecting Consciousness

item.title: Constitutional Sheriffs & Peace Officers Association
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: Story uses gorgeous typefaces and is optimized for a pleasant reading experience on any device.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->The CSPOA was started because of the huge need to remind sheriffs and peace officers about their oath of office. Throughout America, law enforcement agencies have a slogan that defines the primary function of the agency. The slogan, which has been used for decades, yet which has been removed from the door of many police agency patrol vehicles, is To Protect and Serve.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Global Ecovillage Network
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: With Story, your site will have built-in search with no external dependencies.The Global Ecovillage Network (GEN) catalyzes communities for a regenerative world. GEN is a growing network of regenerative communities and initiatives that bridge cultures, countries, and continents.

item.title: Handmade by Zionette
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: Story comes with a lot of power, but it’s all configurable: almost every extra feature is optional.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Masterpiece handmade items brought to you by Zionette. I use the finest qualities and my yarns are purchased from Lion Brand Yarns made here in the USA. Lion Brand Yarn was founded in 1878 in the United States. It is the oldest producer of knitting and craft yarn in the United States.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: One Small Town
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: This page is a tour of Story’s features, so you can take full advantage of its power.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Imagine a perfect world full of harmony and abundance. The kind of world most of us have dreamed of all our lives. This world is possible and we are creating it for ourselves – not somewhere in the distant future, but now, in our own lifetime.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.author: PEOPLE Unleashed
item.description: Story’s Remark frameworks help you create sophisticated slides with simple, clean Markdown. There are predefined layouts for most presentation needs, beautiful typography and colors, precise image control, and a simple modular way to create custom layouts.“Our success is contingent upon the highest moral idea “the greatest good to the greatest number”. Aspiration, desire, and harmonious relations, constantly and persistently maintained, will accomplish results. Well-Being comes from Well-Doing”. ~ Charles F. Haanel
